var Todo = Backbone.Model.extend({});

var todo1 = new Todo();
console.log(JSON.stringify(todo1));

var todo2 = new Todo({
	title:"Check the attributes of both model instance in console.",
	compleated:true
});
console.log(JSON.stringity(todo2));
